jot.manager.ai

Class PathFindersManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • jot.manager.ai.AbstractAI
      • jot.manager.ai.AbstractPathFindersManager
        • jot.manager.ai.PathFindersManager

  • public class PathFindersManager
extends AbstractPathFindersManager
    Class that implements Pathfinder algorithms.
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes

        This method gets a new hash map Graph.
        Specified by:
        getGraph in class AbstractPathFindersManager
        Returns:
        Graph, which corresponds to a hash map where each key is a Graph node coordinates that is associated with a list of neighbor nodes.

      • findPath

        public org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D[] findPath()
        This method returns a path if found using either a default or a provided pathFinder logic.
        Specified by:
        findPath in class AbstractPathFindersManager
        Returns:
        if a path is found returns, an array of Vector3D coordinates of the points to go from an start to an target position. Otherwise returns null.
